org.apache.paimon.hive

Class HiveCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.catalog.AbstractCatalog
      • org.apache.paimon.hive.HiveCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Catalog

    public class HiveCatalog
extends AbstractCatalog
    A catalog implementation for Hive.
